page.title: 14LIFE STYLES ROWINGTON AREA
page.content: Population: The average number of people living in one house is estimated at about five. Pets range from fish to horses, tortoises to pigs. Housing: This was a fairly wealthy area and the average house had about five bedrooms.There was a mixed variety of old and modern houses.There are quite a few well maintained council houses. Employment: Due to the recession many people are unemployed, but a lot of people in the villages are self- employed. Most employed people comm- ute to work, and therefore own two or three private cars. Domestic duties: Generally most of the domestic duties are done by the women in the house.These include washing, cleaning, ironing, etc. Few houses employ a maid or servant.
